page.title: 14POPULATION 2
page.content: ANSWERS RECEIVED. ------------------ 1.Average time lived in Dodworth was 34.1 years. 2.1 person didnot like living in Dodworth,10 people did. 3.6 people said they never shopped in Dodworth,3 always shopped in Dodworth,2 occasionally shopped in the village. 4.6 replied there was sufficient shops,2 replied there wasn't enough shops,3 didn't know. 5.An average was again calculated,this was 1.5 visits per week. 6.7 travelled by bus,3 travelled by car,1 gave no opinion. 7.8 stayed at home during the evening,3 went out. (Results typed in by T.Gelder)
